GSP33mbrahsiu:11: parāṃ ca devatāṃ guṇābhidhānalakṣaṇayā stutyā kāyavāṅmanaḥprahvatālakṣaṇayā ca praṇatyā pūjayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:17: rāganibandhanā ca pravṛttiḥ saṃsārabījamiti na muktaye syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:20: tasmātsakaladuḥkhātige brahmatattve duḥkhebhya udvignaḥ sukhebhyaśca vītarāgaḥ pravartamāno mucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:47: yatraiva kāmaḥ sa eva sukhayati viṣayaḥ, netaraḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:49: anyathā ya ekasya sukhaḥ sa sarvasya syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:50: kāmanivṛttyā tu sukhatve yatra yasya kāmo 'bhiruciḥ sa eva tasya sukha iti yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:54: uktaṃ hi 'na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānāmupabhogena śāmyati'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:59: samāne ca prārthitārthalābhe pramodabhedo na syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:70: kāmābhāvamātre ca sukhe 'kāmitaviṣayopabhoge na bhogāvasthāyāḥ pūrvāpare avasthe bhidyeyātām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:72: bhogāvasthāyāṃ prabuddhādhvastakāma eveti cetpūrvā [KKS_3] parayorapi dvayoravasthayostarhi sukhī itaratra duḥkhītyanubhavaviruddhamāpadyeta
GSP33mbrahsiu:80: yāpi kācidananubhūte 'pi jātiviśeṣabhājāṃ kāmapravṛttiḥ sāpi prāgbhavīyānubhavanibandhanā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:101: tattvadarśanavaimalyāttu tattve cetasaḥ prasādo 'bhirucirabhīcchā na rāgapakṣe vyavasthāpyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:103: anyathā sarvaduḥkhātige 'pi tattve taddveṣanibandhanā pravṛttiriti saṃsārānubandhaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:104: api ca dṛṣṭaparotkarṣarāgibhyo 'pīndriyajaya upadiśyate sādhanatvena kāmādityāgātmakaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:114: kartṛkarmabhāvaśca na kriyāṃ karaṇaṃ cāntareṇa yataḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:123: pramāṇasya phalamarthāntaramanarthāntaraṃ vā sarvaparīkṣakaiḥ pratijñāyate prajñāyate ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:133: yathā ca kartaryātmanyasaṃvedye saṃvideva na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:137: na hyātmāsaṃvedyaḥ phale viṣaye cānusaṃdhātuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:148: tathā hi sarvakarmapratyastamayahetuka eva sa ucyate '
GSP33mbrahsiu:161: na hyekasya dve rūpe yujyete, virodhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:181: viśiṣṭasyāhlādātmanaḥ prakāśasya cāndramasasyeva śabdadvayena pratipādanānna doṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:186: atha ca eka evābhyāmarthaviśeṣaḥ pratipādyate prakāśaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:194: na hi svarūpataḥ paramatāsaṃbhave virodhyasaṃsargādupacaritā sā yuktā bhavitum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:196: evaṃ ca laukikānanda etasya mātreti yujyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:257: sā hi sādhyasādhanādivibhāgaṃ nivartayantī sarvatra cātmābhimānamāvirbhāvayantī tadvirodhinī syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:270: ekasminnapyātmani sarvagate śarīraparimāṇe 'ṇuparimāṇe vā kalpitabhedanibandhanā bhogavyavasthā dṛśyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:274: na hi pādasya śiraso vā vedanayābhisaṃbandhaḥ, ajñatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:281: api ca tatrāpi na pradeśaḥ pradeśāntaravedanāmanusaṃdadhāti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:286: eko 'pyātmā pradeśaiḥ sukhaduḥkhādibhiryujyamānastatra baddha iva itaratra mukta iva ca gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:287: yathā malīmase darpaṇatale malīmasaṃ mukhaṃ viśuddhe viśuddhaṃ darpaṇarahitaṃ ca gamyamānaṃ tadupādhidoṣāsaṃpṛktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:289: kalpanā pratipattuḥ pratyayasya dharmo na vastu vyavasthāpayitumalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:290: na khalu pratipattuḥ pratyayamanu viparivartante vastūni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:328: citestu vibhaktamasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ tayā cetyata iti duravagamam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:336: anādinidhanatve hi nāpaneyaṃ nopaneyaṃ vā kiñcidastīti tadarthāni śāstrāṇi tadarthāśca pravṛttayo vyarthāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:345: na ca śāstrāṇāṃ muktyarthānāṃ ca pravṛttīnāṃ vaiyarthyam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:352: na vā syāt, tatra kiṃ nivartyam? atha matam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:361: yasya tattvāgrahaṇaṃ brahmaṇi prayatnalabhyayā vidyayā nivartyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:365: tasya brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvaścetsa nityaḥ kathaṃ nivartyeta?
GSP33mbrahsiu:452: na hi māyākārasya vividhaṃ prapañcaṃ [KKS_11] darśayato 'ṅgasākalyavaikalyavibhāgena rāgadveṣavibhāgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:453: citrapustādikṛtāṃ vā vikalāvikalādibhedena citrāṇi tāni tāni kurvatām,
GSP33mbrahsiu:454: bālānāṃ ca mṛṇmayādibhiḥ pratikṛtibhedairvicitraiḥ krīḍatāṃ na teṣu kiñcidvaiṣamyaṃ nairghṛṇyaṃ vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:455: karmāśayānurodhena ca vidadhato vaicitryaṃ na doṣa ityācāryāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:462: tathācetanasya gomayasya cetano vṛścika ityādi bahuvidhaṃ prakṛtivikāravailakṣaṇyamutprekṣitavyamityalamatiprasaṅgena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:480: api ca pārthivānāmaṇūnāṃ śyāmatānādiḥ pākajena varṇena nivartyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:508: avyatireke 'pi ca brahmaṇo jīvānāṃ bimbapratibimbavadvidyāvidyāvyavasthā vyākhyātā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:514: sa ca sāmānyena bhedadarśanaṃ pravilāpayannātmanāpi pravilīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:517: tathā ca tasminnapi pravilīne svacchaḥ pariśuddho 'syātmā prakāśate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:518: yathā rajaḥsamparkakaluṣitamudakaṃ dravyaviśeṣacūrṇarajaḥ prakṣiptaṃ rajontarāṇi saṃharatsvayamapi saṃhriyamāṇaṃ svacchāṃ svarūpāvasthāmupanayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:519: evameva śravaṇādibhirbhedadarśane pravilīyamāne viśeṣābhāvāttadgate ca bhede,
GSP33mbrahsiu:523: yathā ghaṭādibhede tadākāśaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paramākāśameva bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:530: yathā payaḥ payo jarayati [KKS_13] svayaṃ ca jīryati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:531: yathā ca viṣaṃ viṣāntaraṃ śamayati svayaṃ ca śāmyati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:554: 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:560: tatrāvidyayaiva vidyāpratyāsannayā vibhāgadarśanamavidyāṃ tīrtvā vidyālakṣaṇe nitye svarūpe 'vatiṣṭhate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:570: bhavati hi māyā prīterbhayasya ca nimittam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:580: api ca abhedadarśanopāyā api na svarūpeṇa mithyā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:591: īdṛśīṃ rekhāṃ dṛṣṭvāyaṃ varṇaḥ smartavya iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:594: bālā hi rekhāsu varṇatvenaiva vyutpādyante loke 'bhedena ca vyapadeśaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:603: yasyaiva kṣaṇikajñānamātmā tasyaiva tūpaneyāpaneyāsambhavānmokṣaśostrāṇāṃ muktyarthānāṃ ca pravṛttīnāṃ vaiyarthyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:622: api cābhyupagamyāpi kṣaṇikaṃ vijñānamanādinidhanāyā eva santatermuktisaṃsārāvabhyupetau /
GSP33mbrahsiu:626: sa hyantyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kiñcitkāryamārabheta vā, na vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:637: na ca sārvajñasya jñānasya caramakṣaṇa upādānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:650: sā hi tasyāvasthā dehendriyādyupādhibhirakṛtāvacchedā bṛhatī brahmeti gīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:651: jñānasvabhāvatve ca sarvagatasya dehendriyanirapekṣasya nityatvājjñānasvarūpasya sannihitavividhajñeyabhedasya bṛhattaraḥ saṃsāraḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:654: sakarmako hi jānātyartho nāsati karmasambandhe yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:663: yathā ca sphaṭikadarpaṇādayaḥ [KKS_16] svacchāḥ prakāśasvabhāvā api yadevopanidhīyate yogyaṃ ca tacchāyāpattyā tadeva darśayanti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:664: evamayaṃ puruṣo bhogāyatanaśarīrastho bhogasādhanendriyopanītān śabdādīn bhuṅkte,
GSP33mbrahsiu:673: manaḥsaṃyogamukhena sarve hi tadviṣayā viṣayatve 'sya vartante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:676: api cāsyābhedadarśanapariniṣpattyā sarvasminnātmabhāvamāpanne dṛśyābhāvādeva na darśanaṃ dṛksvabhāvasyāpi dagdhuriva vahnerdāhyābhāvānna dāhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:685: kaśca sarvataḥ preyasa ātmano 'bhāvamabhikāṅkṣedityapuruṣārtho mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:693: yasya tu nirmṛṣṭanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅgā paramānandasaṃvedanāvasthā tasyaivaikāntikaṃ puruṣārthatvamityalamatiprasaṅgena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:709: yathā devatāyāḥ sākṣātpūjāsambhavāttallāñchane dāruṇyaśmani vā pūjāvidhānaṃ tadbuddhyā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:715: omiti yuñjīta'iti yatra yogāṅgatā śrūyate tatraivam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:716: yatra tu yuñjītetyāderaśravaṇāttādātmya eva paryavasyati vākyam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:720: atra hi sarvavāganugamena tadatyāgādoṅkāro vācastattvamiti darśayitvā vāgrūpātyāgācca rūpaprapañcasya '
GSP33mbrahsiu:725: na ca sarvātmabhāva aupacārikaḥ stutyartha iti yuktam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:727: sarvasya hi pratyakṣādyanavaseyaṃ śāstragamyamidaṃ rūpaṃ na viruddhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:730: iti ca sārvātmavida eva tena dhyānopadeśaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:735: 'vāgeva viśvā bhuvanāni jajñe vāgevedaṃ bubhuje vāguvāca'ityādau vācaḥ sārvātmyaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:736: tathā vāksūkte vācaḥ sarvātmatvaṃ sarveśitvaṃ ca pradarśitam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:746: tathā hi dhūmādatrāgniriti pratipattervyadhikaraṇatayā vyaktaṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ śabdādarthāvagamasya saṃvedyate sarveṇa /
GSP33mbrahsiu:753: api ca dhūma iva śabde pratipattihetau na tādrūpyeṇa niścayaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:754: na ca dhūmātpramāṇāntarādvāgnau niścayo dhūmarūpānukārī bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:761: na ca niścayaḥ śabdānurāgaśūnya iti teṣāmapi pūrvajanmaśabdabhāvanābhājāṃ vāgrūpoparaktameva jñānaṃ niścīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:762: tathā ca tadrūpopagrāhyaṃ jagattadvivarta iti pratīmaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:780: tasmātpravṛttinivṛttyānuguṇyena śabdatattvameva [KKS_19] tathā tathāvabhāsata iti sāmpratam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:785: na vikalpapratyayo vāgrūpoparāgarahita iti vāktattvameva tathā tathā vivartata iti nyāyyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:787: api ca yadyapi ṣaḍjādiṣu gavādiṣu ca prāk śabdājjñānamasti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:792: tathā ca gopālāvipālādayo vivekajñānasiddhaye saṃjñāṃ niveśayanti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:793: evaṃ ca śabdasaṃsparśe 'rthe bodhotkarṣadarśanāttatpratihāre ca saṃcetitānāmapyasaṃcetitakalpatvātpathi gacchatastṛṇādīnāmapakarṣādvāgrūpādhīnameva citaścititvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:796: sarvathā vāgrūpādhīno jñeyabodha iti sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ vāgrūpānvitaṃ gamyata iti tadvikārastadvivarto vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:808: 'yasmin vikriyamāṇe 'pi tattvaṃ na vihanyate tadapi nityam'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:880: tathā hi na svābhāvikaṃ bhayaṃ brahmaṇi,
GSP33mbrahsiu:886: yena duḥkhitasyaiva sukhaṃ sukhatve 'vatiṣṭheta iti prapañcitametatpurastāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:889: iha hi vijñānātmāno brahmaṇo vibhaktāḥ syuḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:891: svato brahmaṇaiva vā vibhajyeran bhogārthaṃ krīḍārthaṃ vibhūtikhyāpanārthaṃ vā svabhāvādvā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:902: ānantyādeva tarhi na sarvātmanopalabdhiḥ saṃbhavatīti guṇapuruṣānyatākhyātimato 'pi punarāvṛttiḥ saṃbhāvyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:903: avidyāpūrvakarmanibandhanatve 'pyanādau saṃsāre 'nantatvātkarmaṇāmaniyatavipākakālatvācca pratisargāvasthāyā iva muktyavasthāyā api pratyudāvṛttibhayaṃ na vyāvartate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:904: avidyānibandhanatve 'pi tasyā nirhetutvānniṣprayojanatvācca pravṛttestathaiva punaḥ punaḥ pravṛttiḥ kena vāryate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:906: svatantre tu brahmaṇi vibhaktānāṃ jīvānāṃ dehendriyopabhogahetāvavibhaktānāṃ vā vibhajya bhogādibhirhetubhirna punardehādibhedo na sambhāvyate
GSP33mbrahsiu:907: svatantro hi krīḍayā svātantryakhyāpanena [KKS_22] vā svabhāvena vā punarbadhnīyāllaukika iveśvaraḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:910: tathāpi karmaṇāmānantyādvipākakālaniyamābhāvācca kalpaśatātikrame 'pi prāptavipākakālebhyaḥ karmabhyaḥ punarbandhaḥ sambhāvyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:970: pravṛttyā hyanumāyārthapratyayaṃ tatra śabdasya sāmarthyapratītiḥ (@pratīteḥ -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:971: tathā ca na pravṛttisambandharahiteṣvartheṣu śabdānāṃ śaktirgamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:972: tathā satyanavagatasāmarthyāḥ śabdā bhūte 'rthe kathaṃ tadavagamayeyuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:978: atyantāparidṛṣṭastu padādanavagamyamānaḥ padārthasaṃsargātmake vākyārthe na guṇatvena pradhānatvena vānupraveśamarhati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:979: api ca pralīnanikhilāvacchedaṃ tattvamagocara eva pratipatteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:994: na ca sukhī bhava iti tatra pravṛttirupadiśyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1003: na ca bhūtārthaparyavasitasyaiva śabdasya [KKS_24] prayojanavattve pravṛttyavadhirvyāpāraḥ kalpayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1010: tathā durjanavacanānyapriyākhyānāni viṣādaprayojanāni na pravṛttiṃ nivṛttiṃ vopadiśanti pūrveṇaiva nyāyena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1011: tathā rajjuveṣṭitasya sarpaveṣṭitamātmānaṃ manyamānasya bhayanivṛttaye tattvākhyānaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1015: yatra niyogārthaṃ pratibudhya puruṣo buddhipūrvaṃ niyogasāmarthyādicchayā vā punaḥ pravartate nivartate vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1017: na ca bhayanivṛttau puruṣārthatvātsvayaṃpravṛttaḥ puruṣo niyojyaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1022: tathā dūradeśavṛttāntākhyānāni pṛṣṭavatāṃ kutūhalināmautsukyanivṛttyarthāni bhūtārthaparyavasitāni na hānāyopādānāya vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1029: śabdādbhūtamarthaṃ pratipadya tasya pramāṇāntarāvagatāmupakārahetutāmapakārahetutāṃ vā saṃsmṛtya icchayā pravartate dveṣeṇa nivartate vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1030: nanu prayoktā buddhipūrvakārī śrotuḥ pravṛttyarthaṃ nivṛttyarthaṃ vā vacanaṃ prayuṅkte /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1032: idaṃ hi tatra prayoktavyaṃ na prayujyate '
GSP33mbrahsiu:1037: bhūtārthaparyavasitasyāpi vacaso bhūtārthāvagamamukhena pravṛttinivṛttyaṅgabhāvo yato na vyāhanyate pratyakṣādīnāmiva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1038: bhūtārthapramāparisamāptavyāpṛtayaḥ pratyakṣādayo mātrayāpyagocarīkṛtapravṛttinivṛttayo na pravṛttinivṛttyaṅgabhāvaṃ [KKS_25] jahati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1042: anyathā nidhiprāptidvārikā nānāvidhapuruṣārthāvāptirapi tasyābhisaṃhiteti śabdārthaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1043: yadā ca pravṛttiṃ nivṛttiṃ vābhisaṃdhāya kiñcitpratyakṣādibhirjijñāsyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1054: vyutpannavibhaktyarthaśca yatpacatyarthe karaṇaṃ paśyati tasya kāṣṭhaprātipadikārthatāṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1055: tathā harṣaviṣādāśvāsaprayojanebhyaḥ tattvākhyānebhyo harṣādinimitteṣu bhavati vyutpattiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1061: putraste jātaḥ'itīdaṃ vākyamāptena tatra putrajanmani prayuktamiti pratipadyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1070: tatra svārthamātraparyavasāne vākyārthapratyayābhāvaḥ prayogavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1079: api ca sarveṣāṃ kāryānvayitve parasparaṃ padārthānāmanabhisambandhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1086: kimataḥ? asti niyogātiriktārthānvaye 'pi padasya sāmarthyaṃ niyogānapekṣaṃ ca,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1088: na ca niyogākāṅkṣānibandhanaḥ saṃsarga iti pratipādayiṣyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1089: anadhigatamapi ramāṇāntareṇānadhigatasambandhaṃ ca svaśabdena śakyaṃ śabdena nirūpayituṃ viśeṣapratiṣedhamukhena,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1105: atha cādṛṣṭasaṃsthānabhedopaplavavivekamapi buddhyā bhedāpohadvāreṇa svayaṃ pratīyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1114: kiṃ kṛtsna āmnāyo bhedaprapañcavilayamukhena brahma nirūpayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1123: tathā vidhiniṣedhacodanāsvapi naisargikīṇāṃ rāgādinibandhanānāṃ pravṛttīnāṃ pravilayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1135: anye (Ms A; anye tu edition) manyante ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1137: karmabhistu kṛtakāmanibarhaṇaḥ sahasrasaṃvatsaraparyantaiḥ prājāpatyātpadātparamādvaitamātmānaṃ pratipadyata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1140: pṛthakkāryā eva santaḥ karmavidhaya ātmajñānādhikāramavatārayanti puruṣam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1145: 'yena kenacana yajetāpi darvīhomenānupahatamanā eva bhavati'; iti ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1151: anye tu parasparavirodhinoḥ karmātmajñānayoḥ dvaitādvaitaviṣayatvenāsaṃbandha eveti manyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1160: api ca sarvavidhiniṣedhānāṃ nāmarūpapravilayakāryāpavargitve jantūnāmabhyudayavinipātā akarmanimittā ākasmikāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1170: tatra ca nairākāṅkṣye kathamanyānupraveśaḥ? atha matam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1180: [KKS_29] yatpratigrāmaṃ vaktuḥ śrotuśca satyāmarthaprāptau pramāṇāntareṇānadhigate paradeśaprāptyabhiprāye pūrvopadeśān pūrvārthāneva pārśvasthāḥ pratipattāraḥ pratipadyante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1188: tatra paradeśaprāptiparatāyāṃ tu na niyogatastatra gamanam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1207: na ca sāṅgrahaṇyāḥ sevāyāśca grāmopāyatve kaścidvirodhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1209: tatra yugapatkrameṇa vā phalabhūmārthinaḥ sevāsāṅgrahaṇyāvanutiṣṭhataḥ ko virodhaḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1210: api ca sakaladṛṣṭārthapravṛttinirodhe niyoganiṣṭhā api pravṛttayo nirudhyeran,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1212: api ca tulye kāmopāyatve dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthapravṛttyorna na viśeṣo rāgādyākṣiptatve /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1215: tathā ca prapañcābhiniveśe tulye kena viśeṣeṇa ekātmānuguṇyaṃ bhajate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1221: tulyakāryanibandhanatvācca virodhādyā [KKS_30] nirodhāśaṅkā sā dūrato nirastāvakāśā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1222: atha kāmaprāptyā karmavidhayaḥ kāmān pravilāpayanto jñānādhikārānuguṇāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1224: 'yadā sarve pramucyate kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1230: kalayāpi cetkāmairmanaḥ saṃspṛśyate hriyata eva hāribhiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1233: 'bhogābhyāsamanu vivardhante rāgāḥ kauśalāni cendriyāṇām'; iti ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1253: dvitīyo 'pi kalpo varṇitādeva kāmānāṃ kāmanibarhaṇasāmarthyābhāvātsvakāryanirākāṅkṣāṇāṃ cānyānupraveśe pramāṇabhāvādasamañjasaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1259: tatra hi prakaraṇātprakṛtakarmāpūrvalakṣaṇāparo brīhiśabdaḥ svasvarūpa ānarthakyātprakṛtāpūrvasambandhaṃ bodhayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1266: tathā cājñāte pārārthye yā nāma phalaśrutirna sārthavādinī bhavatīti pṛthagadhikāratvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1296: tajjñānasya kathaṃ karmapravṛttirdṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ syāt? tathā hi ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1297: brahmānandamekamadvayamātmānaṃ vijānataḥ kimarthaṃ kathaṃ vā pravṛttiḥ syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1300: yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā [KKS_32] tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1301: tathā 'yo vā etadakṣaraṃ gārgyaviditvāsmiṃlloke juhoti'ityupakramya yāgādiphalasyāntavattādarśanena brahmavidyāyāstādarthyaṃ darśitam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1334: atha bandhahetuvicchedaḥ sādhya iti tasmin vicchinne tadabhāvānmucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1347: tattvāgrahaṇanimitto viparyāso nimittanivṛttau svayameva nivartiṣyate, tacca na /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1354: ato viparyayajñānasya nivṛttirvidyayā sādhyeti tatra jñānasya sahakāryapekṣā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1356: na khalu śuktikādiṣu viparyāsapurassaraṃ samupajātasamyagjñānāstannivṛttaye pṛthak prayatante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1358: yato virodhibhāvāntarotpāda eva pūrvapradhvaṃsaḥ, na śūnyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1368: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare'; //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1383: pramiteḥ pratyakṣaparatvāttatra ca nairākāṅkṣyāttadarthyata iti cet,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1409: anadhigata eva tarhi śabdena pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1423: kathaṃ khalvavagatabrahmātmabhāvo viditātmayāthātathyo mithyādarśananimittairdharmairyujyate? śrūyate ca ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1429: tathā 'aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1444: abhyāso hi saṃskāraṃ draḍhayan pūrvasaṃskāraṃ pratibadhya svakāryaṃ santanoti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1456: draḍhiyasi ca mithyādarśanaje saṃskāre niścayā api mithyārthā bhavanti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1459: tathā pramitarajjubhāvāyā api rajjvāḥ pramāṇānanusandhāne sarpabhrāntyā bhayadarśanam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1460: tasmājjāte 'pi pramāṇāttattvadarśane anādimithyādarśanābhyāsapariniṣpannasya draḍhīyasaḥ saṃskārasyābhibhavāyocchedāya vā tattvadarśanābhyāsaṃ manyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1471: api cānyathāniścaye 'pi raṅgagatā bharatādayo mithyāvabhāsena śokabhayādihetavaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1472: niścite 'pi guḍasya mādhurye tatra mithyātiktāvabhāso 'vitatha iva duḥkhayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1495: pratipannagārhasthyasyātmavidyayaiva kṛtakṛtyatāṃ manvānasya ṛṇāpākaraṇaṃ pratyanādṛtasya vihitākaraṇanimittasya pāpmano vidyodayapratibandhṛtvaṃ darśayati ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1514: tathā cordhvaretasāṃ cāśramiṇāṃ vināpi tairviśuddhavidyodaya iṣyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1516: sādhanaviśeṣāddhi sā kṣipraṃ kṣiprataraṃ ca vyajyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1570: -- edition; Originally Brahma- and Tarka-kāṇḍas were together;
GSP33mbrahsiu:1571: Vacaspati does not know this division.]
GSP33mbrahsiu:1581: āmnāyavirodhādeva tu pratyakṣādīni pramāṇatāyāḥ kimiti na cyavante?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1601: karmavidhayo hi bhedāśrayā abhedāśrayāśca vedāntāḥ parasparaparāhatā asatyapi pramāṇāntaravirodhe durlabhaprāmāṇyāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1614: tulyabalatve 'pi pratyakṣādīnāmāmnāyasya ca vastuni vikalpānupapattervirodhe saṃśayaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1628: śakyo hyāmnāyādevānādiravidyāsaṃskāro vibhramahetuḥ pratyakṣādiṣu saṃbhāvayituṃ niścetuṃ ca dehātmābhimāna iva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1633: yatra ca vyavahāraviparyayo na tatra prāmāṇyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1634: śabde tu saṃbhāvitadoṣe na tattvāvedanena prāmāṇyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1637: pratyakṣādīnāṃ tu vyavahāre saṃvādānna śakyate vyavahāravisaṃvādijñānaheturdoṣaḥ kalpayitum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1640: tato doṣānubandhaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1646: tasmācchabdasya prāmāṇyābhyupagame pramāṇāntaravirodhe 'pi tasyaiva balavattvamiti sāṃpratam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1662: dṛṣṭaṃ ca hetutvenāpekṣitāyā api pūrvasyāḥ pratipatteḥ parasyāḥ pratipatterbalīyastvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1675: tatrābhedaḥ samākṣiptabheda eva pratāyata iti vyāghātaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1687: tatra virodha eva nāstīti balābalacintā nāvatarati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1699: laukikāstu śabdāḥ pramāṇāntarāpekṣaṃ svārthamabhidadhatīti yuktā teṣāṃ tadanusāriṇī vṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1706: tatra dvitīyasyā api vṛtteḥ śabdānāṃ pravṛttidarśanāttayā pramāṇaviṣayalābhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1707: yatra tu śabdāḥ svarasena labhante viṣayam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1717: pramāṇe tu svarasasiddhaṃ parityajya kalpanāyāṃ na nibandhanamasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1734: svarasalabhye tvarthe pratītita eva prāmāṇyamiti netaretarāśrayatā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1738: na khalu rajatajñānānugrahāya śuktiśakalajñānasya gocaro 'paraḥ kalpyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1763: yatra tvekavākyatayā saṃbhūyakāritvaṃ tatrānupajātavirodhitayā svarasavṛttyā mukhye sthite,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1765: parapadāni dvitīyayā vṛttyā pūrvāpekṣitamarthaṃ samarpayantyekavākyatāsāmarthyāditi mukhyabalīyastvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1781: atha bhavati kasya cittīvrakrodhākrāntasvāntatayā samuddhatadhvāntatiraskṛtavivekavijñānasyānarthamapyarthatvena paśyataḥ śāstropadeśamatikrāmataḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1787: tathāpi teṣāmatatparatvān na tatra prāmāṇyaṃ vṛttānteṣvivārthavādapadānām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1793: tadevaṃ balavattve 'pyāmnāyasya yo nāma mandadhīrlaukikavacasāṃ pratyakṣādivirodha upacaritārthatvadarśanāllokavadvede 'pi śabdavṛttamiti manyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1794: yo vā nirūḍhanibiḍatayā bhedadarśanāndhakārasya pratyakṣādīnāmeva balavattvaṃ manyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1797: na hi yo nāma mandaviṣeṇa vṛścikena daṣṭo mriyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1806: tatra vastvantaravyavacchede ubhayasmin vā bhedaḥ pratyakṣagocara iti bhavati virodhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1807: svarūpavidhimātre tu kasyacidvyavacchedena śūnye na bhedaḥ pramāṇārthaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1822: na hi tatra kvaciddeśe kāle vā niṣedhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1827: khapuṣpādiṣu tāvatsiddheṣu khādiṣu tadvidhāḥ puṣpādayo niṣidhyante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1830: kutaścinnimittād buddhau labdharūpāṇāṃ bahirniṣedhaḥ kriyata iti varṇayanti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1833: api cānapekṣitaviṣayaniṣedhye vyavacchede śūnyatā pramāṇārthaḥ syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1836: yastu bhedāya vyavacchedaḥ sa bhedyayoḥ siddhimapekṣate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1837: na ca sā vidhānādṛta iti prāgvidhānameṣitavyam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1841: na saṃnihitajaṃ tacca tadanyāmarśi jāyate // MBs_1.6 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1842: na khalvekapramāṇajñānavyāpārau santau vidhivyavacchedau kramavantau yujyete,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1844: kramavatorhi vyāpārayoḥ paścāttano na tadvyāpāraḥ syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1853: anavabhāsamāne hi tatra vyavacchedye vyavacchedamātraṃ syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1868: iti ca saṃnihitārthasāmānye niṣedho vidhipūrva eva,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1896: mā sma bhūdaviśeṣeṇa mā na bhūdekadhījuṣām // MBs_1.7 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1912: na tvidānīṃ darśanapratiniyamasya sāmarthyam, tathā hi ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1913: pratiniyatamapi tatra deśe kāle ca rūpe darśanaṃ tayoryathā rūpavidhimātropakṣayānna [KKS_47] rasaṃ vyavacchinatti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1928: api ca ekaniyamādanyavyavacchede citrādiṣu nīlādīnāmekadarśanabhājāṃ bhedo na sidhyet,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1934: yatprakṛtiḥ khalu yaḥ padārthaḥ sa tayaiva prakṛtyā vidheyaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1941: arūpeṇa ca bhinnatvaṃ vastuno nāvakalpate // MBs_1.8 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1944: tathā ca tasyā ekasyā anekavṛttervastusvabhāvatve vastūnāmapi bhedo na syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1946: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityarthāntarameva vyāvṛttirāsthīyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1947: tathāpi vyāvṛtterarūpatvātsvarūpeṇa na bhāvā vyāvṛttāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1979: na hi kalpitena svabhāvena pāramārthikī tadvattā yujyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1996: na khalu svahetuprāpitodayeṣu svabhāvavyavasthiteṣu vastuṣu svabhāvasthitaye vastvantarāpekṣā yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2011: apekṣātaḥ, tathā hi pratiyogyapekṣaṃ tasya svarūpaṃ vyavasthitam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2012: tathā ca yathāyathaṃ bhedaiḥ pratiyogyapekṣairātmabhūtairbhinnāḥ sarve bhāvā iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2023: hetvantarācca pratiyoginaḥ saṃpadyamānaḥ paścādbhedo na svabhāvaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2027: nānapekṣaṃ kadācidittasya tadvidhatvāttena tadvidhenaiva saha jāyata iti na vikalarūpaprādurbhāvaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2039: tathā hi, nānapekṣya pratiyoginaṃ bhedaḥ pratīyata iti ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2042: yathā vyavasthitānapekṣasvabhāvā rūpādayaścakṣurādyapekṣāyāṃ pratītau na sāpekṣasvabhāvāḥ kathyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2058: bhedo 'pyevaṃ kiṃ na lokasiddhaḥ? api ca
GSP33mbrahsiu:2068: apekṣāhetuśca tatra sādhāraṇī kriyā vidyate vyavasthitayorapi vastunoḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2082: arthakriyākṛte bhede rūpabhedo na labhyate // MBs_1.10 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2093: tau ca loke pratītibhedau satyapi saṃyogidravyavikriyāsāmānye /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2100: yathā cakṣuṣi satyapyadṛṣṭāyāśca badhire tatrāsaṃbhāvinyāḥ śabdabuddherindriyabhedaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2106: yasya khalvadvayaṃ jagattasya kāryajātamekatraiva dṛśyata iti kathamadarśanam?
GSP33mbrahsiu:2120: yastu kṣaṇikavādī tattvameva viśeṣasya na manyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2124: atha kāryābhede na (atha na kāryābhedena -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:2129: yathā tarhi kāryasvabhāvābhedāya na kāraṇasvabhāvābhedo 'pekṣyate, tathā
GSP33mbrahsiu:2141: tatra yathā vyāvahārikādabhedātkāryābhedastathā vyāvahārikādbhedātkāryabheda iti na viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2186: na hi rathādayastatsaṃyogādayo vā nabho vyaśnuvate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2195: tathā ca payaso 'pi tailaṃ tilebhyaśca dadhi syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2204: na tayā tilānāṃ payasaśca bhedaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2211: na hyekaviṣaya ekasya śaktyaśaktī yujyete iti ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2213: yathā khalu dīrghakālāḥ padārthā mitakālairdharmaiḥ saṃbadhyamānāstaddharmāṇo 'taddharmāṇaśca na virodhapadabhājaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2218: yo 'pi dīrghakālamarthaṃ na pratipadyate taṃ pratīdaṃ punaḥ paṭhitavyam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2220: eko 'pi vahniḥ kiñcideva dahati pacati ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2222: tathā na dāhāntarāṇi pākāntarāṇi vā karoti tasminneva dāhye pākye ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2223: tathā bījādayaḥ pratyekaṃ samarthā api nāṅkurāntarāṇi janayanti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2227: anyaṃ pradhvastamāgāminaṃ vaikaṃ kiṃ na janayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2233: abhede 'pi tarhi payasastilānāṃ dadhno 'nutpattau na virodhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2235: yasya tāvaddadhnaḥ payaso janma na tasya tilebhyo 'nutpattiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2240: na hi samarthamityeva kāraṇaṃ sarvaṃ tulyajātīyaṃ janayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2263: tenaikatrāpi viruddhadharmāveśamabhyupayatā durlabha eva dadhno janakatvājanakatvābhyāṃ tilapayasorvibhāga iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2271: abhedādiva ca tādṛśāt kāryābhedasya bhedādapi tadvidhādbhedasyopapatteḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2290: tenāsmin parimitānāṃ viruddhābhimatānāmapyanante na samāveśo na yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2304: kalpite 'pi kāryabhedādyavasthāyā vā kāraṇabhede kimiti na kāryāntaram?
GSP33mbrahsiu:2312: na tu payasastailaṃ tilebhyo dadhi? yadi matam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2354: tatra yathā bhinnāsu śaktiṣu tadbhedādupakārān bhinnāneko 'rthasvabhāvaḥ karoti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2394: sa ca na siddhatvenāsiddhatvena vā yujyata ityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2397: bhedapratipattau sarvasya sarvato bhedagatiḥ syāt, aviśeṣāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2429: na caiṣa viśeṣaḥ prāgvastubhedasiddheḥ sidhyatīti tadevetaretarāśrayatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2449: iti jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vā pramāṇāntaraṃ vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2453: api ca sanmātrarūpe sarvatra pratīyamāne tatsvabhāveṣu vastuṣu netarābhimata itarābhimatapramāṇānutpādaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2460: na cārthamātraṃ dṛṣṭavato 'rthāntare sa evāyamiti pratyabhijñāsti yathaikāṃ gāṃ dṛṣṭavato gavāntare /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2472: tatra yadyekamapi na gamyate nirviṣayataiva syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2473: apratyabhijñānaṃ ca yadi govailakṣaṇyāducyeta satyapi sanmātrarūpānugame,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2476: na hi yādṛśo devadattasya punardarśane ekatvapratyayastādṛśo gavāntare /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2487: grahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇākhyeyaṃ jñātrā śuddhaṃ tu gṛhyate //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2488: na ca yathā maṇikaṃ dṛṣṭavato maṇikāntare 'nusandhiḥ tathā śarāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra mṛjjātirapyapahnūyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2490: na tu yathā maṇikāntare sāmānyarūpāṇāṃ bhūyastvādutkaṭaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2513: nanūktena prakāreṇa pramāṇādanyato 'pi bhedajñānasyodayo na saṃbhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2552: na ca vastubhedaviṣayatve sāmānādhikaraṇyamavakalpate satyapi saṃbandhe /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2553: saṃbandhidvayaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvena dvābhyāmekayā vā buddhyā gṛhyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2568: atastayā viruddhaḥ prakhyābhedo na vastubhedavyavasthāyai prabhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2588: dṛṣṭaḥ saṃsargadharmo 'yaṃ yadyekamapi vai tathā // MBs_1.17 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2595: rūpasaṃskārābhāve hi na sa cākṣuṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2600: atha nārūpaḥ pratīyata iti nāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2603: tathā nagaratrailokyādibuddhayo vividhaviṣayākārā nirbhāsante bhedābhāve 'pīti viṣayākārajñānavādino manyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2610: na ca saṃbandhisaṃbandhaḥ saṃsargo vyavadhānataḥ // MBs_1.18 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2622: ityādibuddhayo vyavahārāṅgabhūtā dravyeṣu guṇajātyupādhinibandhanāḥ tasyaitā na yathāvastu,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2626: evaṃ ca pratyayaviracitenaivāyamarthena vyāvṛtto vyavahāro 'nuvṛttaśceti vyarthā vastubhedakalpanā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2628: yathārthatvāya hi vyāvahārikīṇāṃ buddhīnāṃ vastubhedaḥ kalpyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2640: tatrāsati vastubheda ādhyātmiko doṣo 'vidyālakṣaṇo vyāvahārikajñānabījamiti nārtho vastubhedena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2655: yattu yathā pramāṇenāvagamyate tasya tathābhāve viruddhatvābhidhāne kaṃ batāyamāśritya hetuṃ viruddhatvāviruddhatve vyavasthāpayet?
GSP33mbrahsiu:2659: yato nedṛśāṃ vipratiṣiddhārthajñānānāṃ prāmāṇyameva yujyate saṃśayajñānavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2672: tatra yathā saṃśayajñānaṃ vipratiṣedhādapramāṇaṃ tathā sāmānyaviśeṣapratipattirapi,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2677: yatra tarhi na nirṇayastatra vikalpātmatā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2679: evaṃ virodhe 'pi dvayorekasya vā jñānasya viruddharūpopagrahe tadrūpādhigatyoranyonyanirākaraṇāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2681: parasparanirākṛtau tulyabalatve sandeha iti na saṃśayajñānādekasya sāmānyaviśeṣapratipattirviśiṣyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2699: yathā na sāmānyāṃśo dvirūpo viśeṣāṃśo vā rūpavirodhābhāvāt ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2710: yena sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ svarūpavirodhābhāvāddvitvaṃ na syādanyatarasyeva bhāgasya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2712: sāmānyaviśeṣayośca parasparātmatvena pratipatterasatyapyanyonyābhāvalakṣaṇe svarūpavirodhe buddhe rūpabhedāddvitvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2717: na cetkutastyamekatvamasti ced dvyātmatā katham // MBs_1.22 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2761: ekatve tu yathā sāmānyaviśeṣavibhāgayoḥ svabuddhisamadhigatayorna vilakṣaṇaṃ buddhyantaramarthyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2762: tathā sāmānyabuddherna buddhyantaraṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣādhigamāya prārthyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2789: sāmānyaṃ na hi vastvātmā na bhedaścitra eva saḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2791: yasyaikamubhayātmakaṃ vastu na tasya sāmānyamātraṃ vastuna ātmā na viśeṣamātram /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2795: yasya tvanugamaḥ sa vasturūpaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2796: tathā ca śabdāntaramavalambya bhedā eva satyā ityetatpratipādyate śabdāntareṇa vā hetunā dvyātmakamekamiti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2799: mā bhūdvastu tadaṃśatvaṃ tu na vāryate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2832: tadevaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ tadbhāvānyabhāvābhyāmabheda ityadvaitaṃ jagadityuktamanyaprakārayā vācā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2841: gavāśvasya tu pratyekaṃ gavāśvatve bhedābhāvādanibandhanameva tat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2861: tatra pūrvasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ na vastuno 'nugama ityananvitāni vastūni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2863: sarvathā yena viśeṣeṇāyamaśvādgovastu vyavasthāpayatyanyat tadviśeṣayujastu tasyānanvayādbhedavādaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2864: athānanvayadoṣānna viśeṣamāśrayati abhedavāda iti na dvaitādvaitakalpanopapadyata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2866: teṣāmapi dravyanayaḥ paryāyanaya eva vā // MBs_1.26 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2880: vardhamānakabhaṅgena rucakakriyāyāṃ na kiñcidutpannaṃ naṣṭaṃ veti prītiśokau tadarthinorna syātām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2883: paryāyamātre hi hemni hemno vināśātparyāyavināśe kathaṃ madhyasthatā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:2892: paryāyāntare ca paryāyāntarasyānanugamādananvitāni tarhi vyāvṛttasvabhāvāni vastūni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2910: tasya utpattisthitibhaṅgānāmekatra samavāye dravyārthino madhyasthatā bhavet,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2935: apravṛttinivṛttīdaṃ prāptaṃ sarvatra hī jagat // MBs_1.28 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2936: yadā hi sarvaprakāreṣvanaikāntikatvaṃ bhāvānām, tathā sati ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2954: yadi khalu prītyādīnāṃ sadasattve [KKS_70] naikāntike ('naikāntike -- edition) ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2973: naikajñānaṃ samīkṣyaikaṃ na bhedaṃ tattvahānataḥ // MBs_1.29 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2975: kutaḥ? āpekṣiko hi bhedo nānyamanapekṣya śakyate grahītum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2980: na tvevam (Ms A; na caivam -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:2985: tatrābhedaṃ gṛhītvā tamupādāya tasya yathāvanniścayāśaktau vyavacchedakalpanopapadyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3010: na copalakṣyate pratyakṣabuddhau viśeṣaḥ prakāśate ceti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3012: yastu saṃvittāveva vipratipadyate sarvānātmavyāvṛttaspaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ pratyakṣamiti vadan,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3019: vastudvayānupapatterekasya ca dvyātmatāyogādavaśyakalpanīye 'nyatarasya mithyātve yuktaṃ viśeṣāvabhāsasya mithyātvam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3028: mānasya eva buddhayaḥ kḷptayogyabhāvā mithyātvaṃ prati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3041: tatropādhau pratīyantāṃ tathā bhinnā na rūpataḥ // MBs_1.32 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3049: yo bhāvānāṃ tattvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ vā syāt arthasiddhirevaiṣā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3052: api ca bhedatvādeva viśvasya bhedo 'bhedopādāna iti śakyate 'numātum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3070: bhedo yathā taraṅgāṇāṃ bhedādbhedaḥ kalāvataḥ // MBs_1.34 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3081: na hi pratyekaṃ taruṣu vanamiti buddhiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3095: vyāvṛttasvabhāvasya tadagrahe grahaṇameva hi na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3113: tasmātprakṛtyaiva kecitkasyacidabhedāvamarśasya yogyāḥ kecinneti svabhāvaviparītā bhāvānāṃ sāmarthyātiśayā kalpayitavyāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3115: ekasyaivāstu māhātmyaṃ yadeko 'pi nānevāvabhāsate (nāneva bhāsate -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:3132: [KKS_74] evaṃ pratyakṣādivirodhātkarmavidhivirodhācca śrutārthaparigrahe ye manyante vedāntānāmupacaritārthatvaṃ tatpratibodhanāya vihitaḥ prayatnaḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:3143: tathā ca kathaṃ tarhi mantrārthavādāḥ sopaniṣatkā ityāśaṅkya '
GSP33mbrahsiu:3164: na khalu sopakaraṇe samagre pramāṇe satīcchāpi puruṣasyāpekṣyate jñānaṃ prati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3182: apravṛtto 'pi hi svādhyāyādhyayanavidhivākyādhyayane puruṣāntarādhītāttatastasya cānyeṣāṃ ca vākyānāmadhyayane pravartate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3213: anyonyasaṃśrayānnaiṣa śābdo bodhaḥ sa no paraḥ // MBs_2.3 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3214: śabdādavagamya vidheyaṃ yā pravṛttiḥ sā vidheḥ prayojanam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3225: jāte bodhe na pravartyo natarāṃ khalvabodhake /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3249: artho jñātavya ityukte jñeyaḥ syānnāvivakṣitaḥ // MBs_2.5 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3278: evaṃ ca tasyāvivakṣitārthatve itare 'pi tathā syuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3284: tacchabdato labdhajanmano 'pyātmatattvāvabodhasya puruṣārthasādhanatvāvagamo vidherityetadapi na śobhanam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3286: iṣyate mokṣa iti cetsādhyastattvacyuterna saḥ // MBs_2.9 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3300: satyam, bhāvarūpaṃ tu mokṣaṃ niratiśayānandalakṣaṇaṃ niratiśayaiśvaryalakṣaṇaṃ cābhipretyaitaducyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3305: tathāpi nāsau tattvajñānātpṛthagiti na tena sādhyā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3318: yadā tu viditātmatattvasyādvayaṃ viśuddhaprakāśamātmānaṃ paśyataḥ samutkhātāyāmanavayavenāvidyāyāṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:3337: anuvādaśca pramāṇāntaraviṣaya iti tadapekṣo bhūtārtho nārtha ucyata iti sāpekṣatvādaprāmāṇyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3341: evaṃ ca sati tattvapratipattipare vākye yadyapi vākyārthabodhātparācīnā pravṛttiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3346: uta bhūtārthatā tatra siddhārthamapi yadvacaḥ // MBs_2.13 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3354: yattu bhūtārthamapi na mānāntarādhigata iti bodhayati na tadanuvādakam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3358: sāpekṣatāyāḥ ko hetuḥ śuddhā siddhārthatā yadi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3367: evaṃ ca puruṣabuddhiprabhavaṃ bhūtārthamabhūtārthaṃ vā vaco bhavati sāpekṣam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3381: asaṃbhavati tu kārye 'rthe na kutaścidvisaṃvādāśaṅketi nāpekṣyamasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3384: viśeṣo na hi gamyeta sāpekṣatve tadā tayoḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3388: yadi śabdaḥ pramāṇāntarādhigataviṣayo loke dṛṣṭa iti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3389: pramāṇāntarasyāviṣaye tarhi natarāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tasya bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3408: pramāṇe hi śabde tadviṣaye saṃbhavati tadapi sāpekṣaṃ syāttatsaṃbhava iva śabdaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3429: api ca pratyakṣādhigataviṣayaṃ kiñcidanumānamiti na sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya tathā pratyakṣasāpekṣatā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3430: yathā cāgamapūrvakaṃ ṣaḍjādivivekaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamiti na sarvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tathā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3431: evaṃ puruṣavacasāṃ pramāṇāntarādhigataviṣayatvadarśane 'pi nāpauruṣeyasya tathābhāvo bhūtārthasyāpi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3444: vede tu sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'pi na puruṣavivakṣāpūrvakaḥ ityanapekṣatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3460: loke vede na vyapekṣā talloke ca vyapekṣaṇam // MBs_2.22 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3475: tatra vede 'pi viniyoga eva pramāṇārthaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3495: yadi puruṣo 'dhigate viṣaye vacaḥ prayuṅkte iti viniyogaviṣayatā tasya kalpyate pramāṇāntarāpekṣatvāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3500: vacaḥ prayuṅkte puruṣo nākasmāttena tadgiri // MBs_2.26 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3511: yatra tūpalabdherasaṃbhava eva yathā dṛṣṭārthe buddhādivākye,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3518: [KKS_84] ata eva pauruṣeyatvāpauruṣeyatve sāpekṣatvānapekṣatvakāraṇe nyāyavidbhirdaśite pauruṣeyatvanirākaraṇaprayatnena ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3520: autpattike śabdārthasambandhe 'svātantryācchabdasya na puruṣabuddhipūrvakatvamiti na pramāṇāntarasaṃbhinnā śabdādarthāvagatiriti nirapekṣatvam
GSP33mbrahsiu:3527: atha pramāṇāntarasaṃbhave 'pi yadi codanāprāmāṇyaṃ na vyāhanyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3530: pramāṇāntarasaṃbhave hi sarvajñābhimatabuddhādyupadiṣṭo 'pi dharmaḥ pratīyeta tatra na dharmatattvamavadhāritaṃ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3556: atha saṃsargabhājo no padārthāḥ kriyayā vinā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3557: kimāyātaṃ vidheḥ sāpi tvastyādiḥ sulabhā kva na // MBs_2.29 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3585: tathā cāstyarthaniṣṭhaṃ vākyaṃ pramāṇāntarāpekṣamevārthaṃ bodhayati pramāṇaviṣayatāyā astyarthatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3590: bhidyetottarakāle vā bhavantī na khalu tridhā // MBs_2.31 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3598: tatra yadi buddhiḥ pramāṇaviṣayatāṃ gocarayati pramite hi syāt na pramāṇādeva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3599: na hi prāk pramāṇotpatteḥ san pramāṇasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3605: tathāpi naiva bhidyeta netthaṃ cānyavyapekṣatā // MBs_2.32 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3615: syālliṅgamapi sāpekṣaṃ tatsiddhestata eva cet // MBs_2.33 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3656: meyatvameva sattā cenmāne trividhatā kutaḥ // MBs_2.35 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3684: pramite ca na jijñāsā punaḥ syātsadasattvayoḥ // MBs_2.38 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3685: anāśritakālaviśeṣe pramāṇayogamātre sattve pramitanaṣṭamapi vastu saditi tenārthakriyāprasaṅge 'naṣṭeneva,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3688: sa eva tarhi viśeṣaḥ sadasadvyavahāravyavasthāyā hetuḥ kāryavyavasthāyā iva,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3693: kiṃ ca pramite 'rthe sadasattve jijñāseranna punarlaukikāḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3703: sā ca naṣṭāccyuteti na tasya sattvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3704: smaryamāṇe tu kutaściccyutā kutaścinneti na sarvasyāsattvamiti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3715: tathā ca so 'stiśabdenābhidhīyata ityarthasvabhāvaniṣṭham [KKS_89] astyarthapradhānaṃ vākyamiti kutaḥ sāpekṣatvam?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3718: bhinnā evārthasvabhāvāḥ pramāṇaṃ prati yogyāḥ sacchabdavācyāḥ santu,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3734: yo hi sattāmavajānīte sa dravyatvādīnyapyavajānīta eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3735: na kila tejo dṛṣṭavato 'psu tadavamarśo bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3736: api ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyā api santa eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3761: athaitāvān pramāṇayogyo 'rthakriyāsāmarthyo veti pramāṇayogyatve 'rthakriyāsāmarthye vā saṃgrahaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3772: yastu dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma rūpaṃ vijñānamiti vā saṃśayaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3793: na ca niścite viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhidhānānuviddhaḥ saṃśayo bhavati daṇḍābhāvaniścaya iva '
GSP33mbrahsiu:3826: kāryapramāṇasadasadbhāvanibandhane hi sadasadvyavahāravibhāge tasyāpravṛttireva kāryapramāṇasadasadvyavahāravibhāgasyāpi tannibandhatvaprasaṅgāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3828: tasmādarthasvabhāva ekā satteti (@svabhāva ekaḥ satteti -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:3837: bhūmau nikhātamavidyamānendriyasaṃbandhamadṛśyamānāvinābhūtamasaṃvedyamānānyathānavakalpamānaṃ vastu pralīnadraṣṭṛkaṃ yattasya na pratyakṣānumānārthāpattyāgamahetavaḥ santi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3844: tatra pramāṇahetubhāvalakṣaṇayogyatārūpe sattve pramāṇahetvabhāvasya niścayātsaṃśayo na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3845: atha svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ kaścitpramāṇaṃ prati yogyaḥ sattvam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3847: atha vā pramāṇaviśiṣṭaḥ sacchabdārtha ityetadanena nirākriyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3848: na niścite viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhidhāyiśabdānuviddhaḥ saṃśayo yukta iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3852: amitaṃ hi tathā kasmāttathā na punaranyathā // MBs_2.41 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3858: aparicchinnaṃ hi tathā pramāṇena kimiti tadvidham,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3860: na cettasya tathābhāve 'tathābhāve vā pramāṇavyāpāraḥ kiṃnimitta ekapakṣānurāgaḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3866: iti kīṭakaṇṭakādyabhāve 'pramite kathaṃ tannyāsaḥ? tathā hi ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3898: atha yatra pravṛttiḥ syāttatra kevalasaṃvidaḥ // MBs_2.44 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3899: jijñāseta na sūkṣmārthaṃ kaivalyaṃ saṃvido yadi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3900: kevalo viṣayo neṣṭo rūponmiśre 'pi tadyataḥ // MBs_2.45 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3909: pramite 'pi bhūbhāgādau sthūle sūkṣmakīṭakaṇṭakādibhāvābhāvaparīkṣā na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3922: mānābhāvaṃ yadi kṣuṇṇaṃ meyābhāvasya tatra kim /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3955: yadi khalvadarśane viparyayadarśanabhramo bhavati suṣuptādyavasthāsu viśvābhāvadarśanabhramaḥ syādālokādarśanabhramavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3958: āropasya viṣayaṃ purovarti vastu āropaṇīyaṃ ca rajataṃ jñānenānāpnuvan na rajatabhramavān bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3962: na ca buddhyabhāvo jñānasya viṣayo na vyavahārābhāvaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3967: [KKS_95] astu vā mānayogyatvaṃ sattvaṃ tacca pramīyatām // MBs_2.51 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3982: yadā vacaḥ pramāṇayogyatāyāṃ paryavasitaṃ na viśiṣṭārthasattvaṃ bodhayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3991: pramāṇāntarabhinnārthamapi mānaṃ na no vacaḥ // MBs_2.53 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3996: na khalu pramāṇāntarasaṃbhinnārthamapi vaco na pramāṇam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3998: kathaṃ punaḥ pramāṇaṃ sāpekṣamiti cet, ucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4003: evamayaṃ puruṣo veda'iti ca pratīteḥ puruṣajñānāpekṣam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4005: kathaṃ tarhi puruṣavacaḥ kiñcidabādhitārthamapi sāpekṣatvenāpramāṇaṃ kathyate? ucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4007: yadapekṣaṃ tvasyārthe prāmāṇyaṃ yatsiddhimukhena taṃ sādhayati tatra pramāṇāṃśe bādhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4017: āptavacaḥ punarnārthe nāpi pramāṇāṃśe saṃbhavatpramāṇagocaraṃ bādhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4018: pramāṇāṃśe cānapekṣaṃ tanmukhena cārthasiddhiṃ vidadhannāpramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4024: evaṃ ca pramāṇāntarasaṃbhinnārthatve 'pi vedāntavacasāṃ na prāmāṇyavyāhatiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4036: [KKS_97] na hi pūrvāvamarśena vinā sāmānyakalpanā // MBs_2.59 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4038: avamarśo dṛṣṭasatastathā na hi sadantare // MBs_2.60 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4048: ko nu pūrvāvamarśo 'yaṃ pūrvarūpānvayo dhiyaḥ // MBs_2.61 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4050: sarvātmanā tvanugamo na dṛṣṭaḥ khaṇḍamuṇḍayoḥ // MBs_2.62 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4054: na dṛṣṭamallakasyāsti maṇike khalu tādṛśaḥ // MBs_2.64 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4071: na hi devadattasya dvitīyadarśane yādṛśo rūpānugamaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4078: pūrvāvamarśaḥ sa iti prakhyetyapi na śobhate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4079: maṇikaṃ vīkṣitavataḥ so 'pi nodeti mallake // MBs_2.65 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4081: so 'yam'ityabhedamavagamayantī bhinneṣvapi sāmānyakalpanāheturbuddhiḥ pūrvāvamarśa ityucyata ityetadapi na śobhate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4088: api ca dṛṣṭamaṇikasya mallake na bhavati drāgiva '
GSP33mbrahsiu:4124: 'rājño 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ'phalitā ete vanaspatayaḥ'iti kriyārahiteṣvapi saṃsargaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4127: yato na nirjñātarājasaṃbandhasya puruṣasya phalavatāṃ ca vanaspatīnāṃ satteha pratipādyā gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4135: so 'sti'; 'ye ca phalitāḥ te santi'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4140: athāpi na kriyārahitaṃ vākyamasti kriyāyāṃ ca sāpekṣatā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4149: tathā ca śrutayaḥ kāścidevameva brahma pratipādayanti ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4151: yathāgneḥ kṣudrā viṣphuliṅgā vyuccaranti evamevāsmādātmanaḥ sarve devāḥ'; ityādi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4190: anadhigataṃ hi śroturarthaṃ bodhayituṃ vacaḥ prayujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4200: tasmādvivakṣāviśeṣasiddhirnāsaṃsṛṣṭeṣu padārtheṣu bhavatīti tathā vivakṣayā prayuktāḥ saṃsṛjyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4223: atha pramāṇāntareṇopalabhyārthaṃ vivakṣitvā parasmai pratipādayati puruṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4236: apūrvo 'pi hi śrotuḥ saṃsargo vaktuḥ pramāṇānumānamukhena satyatāṃ labhate tadasaṃbhave 'satyatvādbuddhādivākyeṣu /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4243: kathaṃ nu vidhyadhīnatvaṃ yadi syādanyathā vṛthā // MBs_2.73 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4247: vidhirnaivaṃ kasya hetoratha syādaparaṃ padam // MBs_2.75 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4253: na tāvadvidhiḥ sākṣātsaṃsargasāmānyaṃ tadviśeṣaṃ vā bodhayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4258: na ca loke padaiḥ svārthāḥ svarūpamātraniṣṭhatayaiva pratyyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4288: [KKS_104] śabdādeva mite yo 'pi manyate saṃgatigraham // MBs_2.78 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4289: nānyonyasaṃśrayāvadyaṃ na svayaṃ pramite hi saḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4290: pareṇa śabdāvagate tatpravṛttyā ca sūcite // MBs_2.79 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4319: na khalu bījāṅkurayorivānayorekasya prāthamyaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4322: api ca sarvapratipattṝṇāmanumānapūrvā śabdātpratipattiriti teṣāṃ śabdo 'nuvādaka eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4336: tatra laukikīṣu pravṛttiṣu laukike viditasaṃbandhe vede 'pi tatpratipattireva syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4339: tatra vede laukikānāṃ viśeṣaṇānāmasaṃbhavādalaukikaṃ viśeṣāntaraṃ pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4340: evamapi yaḥ śabdārtho vede sāmānyaṃ sa lokasiddha iti nānuvādatā vyāvartate padārthāntaravat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4341: yo 'pi viśeṣaḥ so 'nyāsaṃbhavena pariśeṣānumānagocara iti na pramāṇāntarāviṣayatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4345: tatra vaidikīṣu pravṛttiṣu laukikapravṛttihetvabhāvādalaukike [KKS_106] tu pravṛttihetau vaidikānāṃ vidhāyakānāṃ saṃbandhajñānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4350: na ca laukikasyaiva śreyaḥsādhanatvasya saṃbhava iti yuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4352: tatra prayogadarśanālliṅādestadanusāreṇa ca śabdārthāvadhāraṇāt pramāṇāntaragamyatāpi śabdārthānupraveśinī /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4357: alaukike pravṛttihetau śabdasya sāmarthyajñānakāle pramito vā syāt, na vā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4362: na hyapramitayoḥ saṃbandhinostadāśrayaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pramātuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4400: tathā na viparyāsaḥ kathaṃ hi tatra yathārthatve tathābhūtagrāhiṇī tatpratītirarthaśūnyā syāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4402: parajñānena ca paraḥ pratipadyata iti subhāṣitam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4427: tattanmithyātve tadasaṃbhave vā pramāṇapratītibādhane 'rthapratīterapi bādhanāttadabādhe cābādhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4429: anyathā pramāṇāntaraparatantraṃ puruṣavaco 'rthe sāpekṣamityetadeva na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4430: na hi yo yasyāviṣayaḥ sa tatra sāpekṣo 'napekṣo vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4450: yadi ca śābdapratītivyatirekiṇyāpi pratītyā sa viṣayīkriyate 'pramāṇātmikayāpi,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4451: bhavatyayamaśābdasyāpi jñānasya gocara iti pramāṇāntarāśaṅkā kena vāryate?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4454: sati hyanyasmin prayojake 'rthe yasyābhāve na prayogaḥ so 'pi tasya śabdasya prayojaka iti gamyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4455: yathā satsu hetvantareṣu yasyābhāve na kāryaṃ so 'pi heturgamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4460: na tu śreyohetutve sati pramāṇāntaragamyatāyā abhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4463: tatra śreyaḥsādhanatāyāḥ prayojakatvasyāvadhāritatvāt [KKS_109] tadabhāve tannibandhana iti gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4468: tatsadbhāvācca prayoga upapadyata iti na teṣu sāmarthyakalpanā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4472: na hi ya ekatra yasya pramāṇasya gocaraḥ so 'nyatrāpi mithyā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4475: tathā yāgādiṣu viprakṛṣṭakālaphaleṣu vedāvagamyaṃ śreyaḥsādhanatvaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4480: tadaviṣaye tu śabdārthe na tadvirodha iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4494: api ca viśiṣṭasiddhau viśeṣaṇamapi śreyohetutvamātraṃ siddham /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4505: tadāpi pravṛttipramitastadhetupratyayo na tamantareṇetyāptavacanārthavadanumeyatā na vyāvartate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4517: na brūmo vidhiranyathā vṛthā syāditi tadadhīnaḥ saṃsargaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4518: kiṃ tu pramāṇāntmanaiva sa svaśabdena pratipādyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4535: kva ca pramāṇameṣo 'rthe na yāgādau svaśabdake // MBs_2.87 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4539: na saṃsargaḥ padārthānāṃ svaśabdaistu prakāśitāḥ // MBs_2.89 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4542: ato na viddhyabhāvena saṃsargo na prakalpate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4548: avidhiṣvapi laukikeṣu vākyeṣu śroturanadhigato 'pūrvaḥ saṃsargaḥ pratīyate '
GSP33mbrahsiu:4552: anupāyatve hi tasya na sa kāminyā kṛtaḥ syāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4559: atha vā śabdastatra na duṣyati phalasādhanasāmarthye,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4563: tasmāt saṃbandhajñānāpekṣatvena padārthāntaraiḥ samānatvādvidhāyakārthasya na śakyaṃ viśeṣeṇa vaktuṃ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4565: sarva eva tu padārthāḥ saṃbandhayogyaiḥ kārakādibhāvaiḥ svapadebhyaḥ pratītāḥ sannikarṣeṇa saṃsṛjyante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4567: loke ca [KKS_112] padaiḥ svārthānāṃ pratipādanaṃ sannikarṣeṇa viśiṣṭārthaparatayā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4570: sarve hi te padairaparyavasitarūpāḥ svarūpamātre prakāśyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4571: evaṃ padārthāntaraistulyatvādvidheḥ na viśeṣeṇa tannibandhanaḥ saṃsargaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4572: sarvapadārthanibandhane ca saṃsarge na vidhyabhāvena saṃsargo nopapadyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4576: pravartakavacanāntarapravṛttidarśanena hi taddhetupratyayamanumāya tatra tasya sāmarthyaṃ gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4587: agnisattāmātrapratyayena vākyātpravṛttisiddherna vākyasya niyojane 'pi sāmarthyaṃ śakyate kalpayitum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4588: arthāntarānvaye ca prayogapratyayopapattau na viśeṣānvaye pramāṇam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4592: pratipattividhau tulyaṃ yadi saiva prayojanam // MBs_2.92 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4595: hanta tarhi svarupe tanna vacaḥ paryavasati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4663: na hi vrīhyādisvarūpagrāhi pramāṇaṃ prayogaikadeśatāṃ bhajate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4675: svātmasthitiḥ supraśāntā phalaṃ tanna vidheḥ padam // MBs_2.103 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4688: tajjñānasya ca vividhārthamātrasaṃbhedāvabhāsasyātmatattvaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ dvaitaleśenāpyanavamṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ gocaraḥ syāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4690: yato yo 'sāvadvayo dvaitaleśasaṃsparśavikala ātmatattvabodhaḥ so 'vacchedavibhrāntivirahāttasya svarūpāvasthānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4701: tathā ca tatsvarūpasthitirviśvāśivopaśamānniratiśayāhlādāvāpteśca suṣṭhu praśāntāparaḥ puruṣārthaḥ phalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4704: na ca puruṣārthe 'pyajñātopāye na pravartata iti yuktam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4708: tathā 'yo hi yadicchati sa tatkaroti'; ityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4711: tāvatā ca tatrāpi pravṛttisiddherna vidhāyakasya tatra vyāpāra āśrayitavyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4733: ataḥ sā śabdapramāṇikā satī vidhiriti gīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4751: na hi pratītimātreṇa ghaṭādayaḥ pravṛttihetava ityādi varṇitaṃ vidhiviveke /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4759: niyukto 'smi'iti yato buddhiḥ sa niyogo vidhiśabdaparyāya iti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4775: na hi taṃ parityajya laukikamalaukikakalpane pramāṇamasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4793: sa hi niyoktṛdharmaḥ svatantro vā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4806: iti niyoge anyena dugdhāyāṃ na punardohamārabhate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4818: sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bhavati saṃkalpādevāsya pitaraḥ samuttiṣṭhanti'; ityādi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4828: na ca mokṣaḥ phalaṃ tasya sādhyo mokṣo na cāparaḥ // MBs_2.105 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4830: vidyaiva cādvayā śāntā tadastamaya ucyate // MBs_2.106 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4838: 'śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyastāsāṃ mūrdhānamabhi nissṛtaikā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4843: yathā vā madhuni nānākusumarasānāṃ samudre ca nadīnāṃ prāptiravibhāgalakṣaṇā tathā syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4849: 'tathā vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4851: 'sa yo ha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati';
GSP33mbrahsiu:4885: atha vijñānātmanāṃ śokamohādyabhāvo viśiṣyata iti cettatrāpi śokādayaścedātmāno vijñānātmanām,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4894: brahmaṇo nyūnaṃ samaṃ vā vijñānātmanām [KKS_121] aiśvaryaṃ syāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4938: na hi śuktikājñānotpādādanyā rajatajñānanivṛttistatsādhyā prayatnāntarasādhyā vā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4945: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ';
GSP33mbrahsiu:4952: na, ekasyāpi vastuno bhāvābhāvarūpeṇa vyapadeśāt, tathā ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4953: 'yadā ghaṭo naśyati tadā kapālāni jāyante'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4961: na hi tadagamane tadupādhestasya brahmaṇo bhedena vijñānātmatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4966: 'araśca ha vai ṇyaścārṇavau brahmaloke tṛtīyasyāmito [KKS_123] divi tadairaṃmadīyaṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:4967: sarastadaśvatthaḥ somasavanastadaparājitā pūrbrahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ veśma'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4969: 'ye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyaṃ tapa ityupāsate'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4986: tasmin parāmṛtāḥ parabrahmarūpeṇāmṛtāḥ santaḥ saṃnyāsayogādbhedena parameśvare svakṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalānāṃ ca saṃnyāsādyogācca sarvamidaṃ kartrādi brahma ityupāsanāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4991: yathā candraloke yāvatsaṃpātamuṣitvā sthita eva tasmin bhuktabhogā āvartante naivaṃ sthita eva brahmaloke tata āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4993: tatpralaye hi na tata āvṛtto bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5008: ato 'vikṛtasya niyatadeśasya brahmaṇaḥ prāptaye yujyate mārgaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5021: kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati?
GSP33mbrahsiu:5030: viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'ityādīni vacāṃsi [KKS_125] vākyabhedadoṣātpṛthagvidhitvamalabhamānāni tādarthyāttadānukūlyena stutyarthatayā vyavatiṣṭhante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5037: ekatvapratipattestu dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ ca phalaṃ śokādinivṛttaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5039: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ';
GSP33mbrahsiu:5048: nanvevaṃ mukhya eva kāryakāraṇabhāva uktaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5055: 'ekamevādvitīyam'iti punaḥ punaḥ śruteḥ sarvabhedanirāsaparatvānna śakyaṃ vaktum ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5069: na hi bimbāt [KKS_126] parasparato vā vyāvṛttāni kānicidvastūni pratibimbāni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5071: tathā na varṇebhyaḥ padavākyaprakaraṇādīni kānicidvastūni santi,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5076: 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5102: tathā ca yatkiñcidīśvaratvaṃ yacca vijñānaṃ yaścānando brahmādiṣu sthāvarānteṣu bhūteṣu brahmaṇi tāni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5106: nanu prapañcaśūnyasyādvaitasya brahmarūpasya jñeyābhāvādīśitavyābhāvācca vijñānamaiśvaryaṃ cānupapannam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5113: kiṃ tu siddhena jñānarūpeṇa siddhayā ceśanaśaktyā jñeyamavāpnoti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5114: īśitavyaṃ ca viniyuṅkte praśāsti ca prakāśadāhavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5115: siddhena hi prakāśarūpeṇa prakāśyaṃ prakāśayati vivasvān /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5127: evaṃ 'sa tatra paryeti jakṣan krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ strībhirvā';
GSP33mbrahsiu:5134: ato yatra yatra nātyantamavacchedaḥ samutkarṣātteṣāṃ tāni tāni pratyāsatterbhūtānyātmatvena bhagavānuktvā ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5155: na ca vidyayā anya iti puṣkalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5160: śrūyate ca tasya phalaṃ bandhahetūnāṃ karmaṇāṃ kṣayaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5162: tathā 'tadyatheṣīkātūlamagnau protaṃ pradūyeta evaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante'; '
GSP33mbrahsiu:5165: anyatra ca 'naitaṃ setumahorātre tarato na jarā na mṛtyurna śoko na sukṛtaṃ na duṣkṛtam';
GSP33mbrahsiu:5185: avidyādhyastāni hi karmāṇi tatsamucchede vidyayā samucchinnānyeva bhavanti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5191: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare'; //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5196: yasya tu vidyā tatkṣayasādhanaṃ śāstrādgamyate tasya [KKS_130] tadanusāreṇa keṣāñcitkṣayo vidyayā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5224: nanu pūrvasmin pakṣe tattvajñānānantaratvāddehapātasya sthitaprajñalakṣaṇābhidhānaṃ na yujyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5229: kiṃ tu sādhaka evāvasthāviśeṣaṃ prāptaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5232: kiṃ tu ārabdhakāryakarmakṣayaṃ [KKS_131] bhogena pratīkṣata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5235: yathā rajjvāṃ sarpasamāropasamutthabhayajanmāno vepathuprabhṛtayastattvadarśanādapāvṛte bhaye kasyacittadaiva nivartante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5246: kṣaṇamapi na syāditi sa eva virodhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5255: tata eva hi sa krameṇa nivartate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5257: tathā nivṛttāyāmavidyāyāṃ karmasu cāviśeṣeṇārabdhakāryeṣvanārabdhakāryeṣu ca nivṛtteṣvārabdhavipākasaṃskārāccharīriṇaṃ bhoktāramiva cāyamātmānaṃ pratyetyābhāsamātreṇa vidvānapi,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5259: sa cāyamīdṛśaḥ sthitaprajño varṇitaḥ vītakāma ātmarūpasaṃtuṣṭo duḥkheṣu cchāyāmātrarūpeṣu
GSP33mbrahsiu:5262: yathā khalvaviduṣo mṛddāruracite stryādau viṣaye chāyāmātradarśanamabhiniveśavikalam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5263: tathā viduṣaḥ kṣīṇakarmāvidyasya [KKS_132] tatsaṃskāramātrāddarśanaṃ chāyāmātreṇaiva viṣayeṣu /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5264: tathā ca 'tadyathāhinirlvayanī valmīke mṛtā pratyastā śayīta evamevedaṃ śarīram'iti viduṣaḥ śarīre 'nāsthāṃ darśayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5273: tadanuvṛttau dehapāta eva na syāditi na dehapātottarakāle tadvipākasya chāyāmātreṇāpi darśanaṃ śakyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5274: yena hi karmaṇā yaccharīramārabdhaṃ tatraiva tadvipākaśeṣābhāsaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5290: pravṛttabhogānāṃ karmaṇāṃ pravṛttavegasyeṣoriva cakrasyeva vā na śakyaḥ pratibandhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5302: viśuddhaṃ khalvātmānaṃ sākṣādanubhavato vipākābhāsastamaspṛśannakiñcitkaro bandhātmā pralīna eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5304: tathāvadātamātmānaṃ jānato viparītaṃ vā khaḍgādiṣu śyāmādyābhāsa utpanno 'pi tattvadarśanādavakāśamalabhamānaḥ pravilīna eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5305: tathā ca na tannibandhanena malinatvena śocatyātmānam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5309: karmaṇo vā śarīrasthitiḥ syātsaṃskārādvā, ko viśeṣaḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:5322: 'yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ'; /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5336: tathā ca taddravyaṃ paramārthatiktamivānavasitamādhuryamiva duḥkhāya bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5337: upāsanādinā sākṣātkṛtātmatattvasya tu virodhātsannapi prapañcāvabhāso nātmasaṃsparśī,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5347: dṛṣṭaṃ hi pramāṇānanusandhāne punaḥ sarpabhrāntyā rajjorbhayam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5353: 'yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate'iti kartṛkarmapravibhāgasya vidyayā pravilayāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5358: na brahma śabdadhīgamyaṃ yadyaśakyo dhiyo vidhiḥ // MBs_2.108 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5370: api ca jñānaviśeṣavidhivādina ātmatattve prāmāṇyameva hīyata iti darśayati ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5376: sattānvayāttu tatsiddhiḥ pratyuteti sa duṣyati // MBs_2.112 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5381: tadā sa svaniṣpattau paryavasitaḥ saha śabdena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5388: iti padānāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena sambandhādanyathā vā vastutattvapratipattiriti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5391: kiṃ tu 'evamidaṃ pratipattavyam'iti kartavyatāniṣṭhā na vastutattve pramāṇaṃ vṛttānteṣvivārthavādotthajñānam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5403: na hi 'yajeta'ityukte yāgasya bhūtakālā vartamānakālā bhaviṣyatkālā vā sattā pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5411: tathā 'aṅgadī kuṇḍalī vyūḍhorasko devadattasya putro 'dhīte'ityadhyayanakriyāvatsarvo viśeṣaṇakalāpaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5414: pratipattirhi viṣayaviṣeśaviśiṣṭā pramīyamāṇā na viṣayaviśeṣasya sadbhāvaṃ gamayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5416: asau vāva loko gautamāgniḥ'iti yathā dyuprabhṛtiṣvanagnidṛṣṭeḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5418: nanu no viparītārthā dhīḥ pratītivirodhataḥ // MBs_2.114 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5424: viṣayarūpavyabhicāriṇi jñāne na tato viṣayaniścayaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5437: naitanna hi pravarteta śuktikāśakale tadā // MBs_2.115 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5444: na tatra yadi tadbuddhiḥ śuktikāśakale 'pi na /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5461: na ca smaryamāṇe rajate sā pravṛttiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5463: na hi pratītimupagate 'pi vastuni yatra tasyāsaṃnidhistatra tenārthī pravartate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5492: na hīndriyasaṃyogasya darśanasya vā kaścidagraha upayogaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5502: ekatvameva smarataḥ prāgrūpaṃ śaśini sphuṭam // MBs_2.127 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5505: viparyayo na hi bhavedbhavanvā salile bhavet /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5525: asati tatra viśeṣajñāne ca dvayoḥ smṛtau saṃśaya eva syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5531: sāmānyadarśane 'pi kadācidekāṃ koṭiṃ smarato na saṃśayo na viparyayaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5536: [KKS_140] api ca anyadeva smarataḥ pūrvarūpamekatvaṃ śaśini dvitvavibhramaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5543: na ca sarvā niyogena bhrāntiḥ sādṛśyabandhanā // MBs_2.129 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5545: kiñcitsādṛśyato hi syānna kaścittatra na bhramaḥ // MBs_2.130 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5547: bhrameṣu niyamo doṣādagrahe na bhrame yamaḥ // MBs_2.131 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5549: kathaṃ śvete pītabhramaḥ madhure vā tiktabhrāntiḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:5554: agrahamātre tu doṣavyāpāre kāmilādidoṣādbhrāntiniyamo na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5568: sarvajñānāni mithyā ca prasajyante 'tra kalpane // MBs_2.137 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5575: sato tu viśeṣagrahaṇa indriyasaṃyukte sāmānyadarśane 'pi nāvivekaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5578: evamapi dvayoḥ smaraṇe na viparyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5583: tanna, anantadeśakālabhedāvagataṃ taddeśāvagataṃ ca dṛśyātsmaryamāṇaṃ viviktaṃ gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5592: svayameva sā svaviṣayaṃ dṛśyādvivinaktīti nāsti dṛśyamānasmaryamāṇayoravivekaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5593: yataḥ smarāmi iti jñānamanyadeva darśanasmaraṇavivekakāri smṛteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5595: smṛtiḥ svaviṣayaṃ vivinakti vā na vā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:5619: na hi kasyacijjñānasya sarvātmanā vastu viṣaya iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5620: satyapi ca vivekajñāne pramāṇāntarād dvicandradiṅmohādyanugatirdṛṣṭeti nāgrahaṇamātraṃ viparyayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5623: ye ca khyātī tu rajataścakṣuḥsaṃyuktavastunoḥ // MBs_2.140 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5629: na krame yaugapadye vā vivekamatirīdṛśī // MBs_2.143 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5645: viparītā tu khyātiḥ saṃnihitasya rajatatāmabhūtāṃ rajatasya vā saṃnihitatāmādarśayantī prasañjayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5650: na hi 'nedaṃ rajatam'iti rajatamātraṃ cakṣuḥsaṃyuktavastumātraṃ vā nirasyamānamavasyāmaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5651: kiṃ tu cakṣuḥsaṃyuktasya tu rajatatāṃ rajatasya vā cakṣusaṃyuktām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5657: sarvajñānānāmagrahabādhenotpattau ca vivekajñānamātramidaṃ na prasaktapratiṣedharūpamiti pratītyanusāriṇo 'nurūpam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5695: smṛtatvenāviviktasya tathā viveke dharmiṇi pratipanne dharmāntarapratipanne dharmāntarapratipatterbādhakatvaṃ pūrvasyāśca bhrāntitvaṃ syātāmiti
GSP33mbrahsiu:5696: yaḥ pratītivirodhastu sa svadoṣa udāhṛtaḥ // MBs_2.149 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5698: 'idaṃ śuklaṃ rajatam'iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīterātmopālambhaḥ parasminnāsajyate pratītivirodhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5703: yo hi jñāyamāne 'rthe 'nyathāpi syādityanāśvāsastasya tenaiva jñānena tathātvaparicchedinotpattirnirudhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5712: vyabhicāravato 'pi ca sitāsitādiṣu cakṣuṣaḥ sati tasmin prāmāṇyāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5713: na ca vyabhicāro bādhaheturdoṣavat prāmāṇyopaghātī kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5721: yatra tvavyabhicāro na kāraṇaṃ tatra vyabhicāre 'pi sati paricchede prāmāṇyamavivādam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5750: pratyakṣaṃ kāryamevaṃ ca hetunānumitaṃ bhavet // MBs_2.156 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5764: kasyacittvarpaṇaṃ tulyamatha tatra na tattathā // MBs_2.158 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5765: parasyāpi hi tatraivamatha tatra tathā sthiteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5766: sarvatra syāttathābhāvaḥ syādevaṃ grahaṇe 'pi te // MBs_2.159 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5773: atha kāniciccakṣuḥsaṃyuktāni vastūni svena rūpeṇa gṛhyanta iti kasyacidagrahaṇe 'pi nānālambanatvam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5783: yathā khalu viparyayajñāne cakṣuḥsaṃprayuktavastusvabhāvanirapekṣatā dṛṣṭā samyagjñāne 'pi śaṅkyate jñānatvasāmānyāttathā cakṣuḥsaṃprayuktamapi vastu nāvikalarūpaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5804: adṛṣṭakalpanā yuktā na ca dṛṣṭasya saṃbhave /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5822: na hi tatrākiñcitkarasya tādarthyena kartavyatā yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5828: na hi tatra kiñcidakurvatprokṣaṇaṃ tadarthaṃ kṛtaṃ syādityevaṃ vidherevādṛṣṭasaṃskārasadbhāvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5830: nānyathā svargakāmasya yāgakartavyatāpratītiryujyate yadi na svargopāyo yāgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5833: anuṣṭhito 'pi na svargakāmenānuṣṭhito bhavatīti kriyāviṣayādapi vidheḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvāvagamaḥ śābdaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5838: jñānaṃ pradarśitaṃ na syādanyathā tadvidheḥ phalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5839: layo nivartyo na tathā vikṣepo hi yathāsukhaḥ // MBs_2.166 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5843: na dṛṣṭamātrād dṛṣṭārthaṃ puruṣārthānugaṃ tu tat // MBs_2.168 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5873: yato nācchādikāyā avidyāyā nivṛttiḥ puruṣeṇārthyate tathā yathā vikṣepasya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5875: layastu vividhaduḥkhanivṛtterasakṛdānandatvena śrutau gītaḥ pratyutārthanīyaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5876: api ca viparyāsamanicchato 'vidyābheda eva na syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5883: prājñaḥ kāraṇabaddhastu dvau tu turye na sidhyataḥ'; //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5889: abhinnasya vastuno 'pradeśasya grahaṇe tathābhāvasya cāgrahaṇātpṛthaktvena pratyavabhāsaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5891: yadi tāvadasamyaggrahaṇamātraṃ tadapaṭutvaṃ vā jñānasya kenaciddrūpeṇa vā grahaṇam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5893: tatra dūrasthe sūkṣme ca bhavatyapaṭu jñānaṃ sāmānyajñānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5895: na ca kiñcijjñānaṃ sarvātmanārthasya grāhakamiti sarvajñānamithyātvāpātaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5907: yadi yathā pṛthagbhūtamaprakāśamānaikatvaṃ prakāśate tathaikamapyātmatattvamagṛhyamāṇaikatvaṃ prakāśata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5918: tadasat, agrahaṇasyābhāvasya svarūpeṇa pararūpeṇa vā grahaṇānabhyupagamāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5920: abhinne ca bhedābhimānaṃ parityajyābhedāgrahaṇe bhedagrahābhimānamūrīkurvatā kiṃ parihṛtaṃ syāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:5931: yathā hi viśuddhamadvaitamātmānaṃ pratipadyamānastathābhūto na śokena saṃspṛśyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5943: paramārthe hi prapañcaśūnyatve pratyakṣādīni pramāṇāni bādhyeran /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5974: idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā'iti śabdasamarpitarūpasya tasya jñānaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5977: jñānaṃ yadi ca dṛṣṭārthaṃ prāptaṃ dṛṣṭata eva tat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5982: na rūpasiddhaye tāvadyataḥ kartavyatā vidheḥ // MBs_2.176 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5986: tadupāye tvavijñāte vidhinā sa pravartyatām // MBs_2.178 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5994: tasya tadvyarthamiti vidhiśatenāpi sa na pravartyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6003: tatrāpi hi niyamādṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ taṇḍuleṣu tatpraṇāḍyā vā pradhānapūrvasiddhiradṛṣṭaiva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6014: tasmādalaukike 'pahatapāpmādirūpa ātmatattve śabdātpratipanne tasya sākṣājjñānaṃ prati tadanubhavopāyatvātsvayameva puruṣasyābhimukhyaṃ bhavatīti vyarthaṃ tadvidhānam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:6015: yathāścaryabhūte kasmiṃścidarthe āgamātpratipanne tasya sākṣātkaraṇe svayamevonmukhatvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6017: tadevaṃ jñāne niyogānupapatterniyoge ca vasturūpāvagame prāmāṇyāyogādvyavasthitātmatattvapratipattimicchatā śabdānna tasya niyogānupraveśo 'bhyupagantavya iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6031: iti ceto dhārayet'iti vivakṣitatvācchravaṇādanyadanucintanaṃ dhyānaṃ pratyayapravāho vidhīyate karmavadevāmṛtatvaphalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6037: tathā ca 'vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta'ityātmatattvavijñānasya siddhatāṃ darśayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6047: iti tu na sakalaviśeṣātigātmatattvānucintanaṃ vidhīyate tadbhāvaphalam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:6081: 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi'iti bhūta eva paryavasitaṃ vākyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6088: tathā ca 'tattu samanvayāt'iti codanālakṣaṇāddharmāttuśabdena viśeṣyaṃ brahma samanvayagamyamuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6089: samanvayo hi padārthānāṃ saṃsargo viniyogastato brahma gamyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:6099: sā copariṣṭādeva nirasiṣyate bahu cātra vaktavyamityalaṃ prasaṅgena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6104: evaṃ tāvatpratipattikartavyatāprāmāṇyavyājena yairaprāmāṇyamuktaṃ tatpratibodhanāya kṛtaḥ prayatnaḥ;
GSP33mbrahsiu:6116: tatra padārtha eva viśiṣṭo vākyārtho bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6122: tatrātyantāparidṛṣṭabrahmādyarthapramāṇābhimateṣu vākyeṣu tadvācīni padāni syuḥ, na vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6123: yadi na santi na ta itaraiḥ saṃsṛjyeran na bhidyeranniti na teṣāṃ prameyāḥ loṣṭādivat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6125: tathāpi tairadhigatasaṃbandhairna pratipādyeran apratipannāśca na viśiṣṭavākyārthapratipattihetavaḥ;
GSP33mbrahsiu:6140: sarvasyaiva hi vākyasyānadhigato viśeṣa eva prameyaḥ tathā kāraṇasāmānyaṃ vā satsāmānyaṃ vā '
GSP33mbrahsiu:6168: yat khalu vākyaṃ na puruṣaṃ kvaciddhitasādhane pravartayati ahitasādhanācca [KKS_158] nivartayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:6179: api cājñānataḥ śokī duḥkhī jīvaḥ prakāśate // MBs_4.6 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:6184: na ca pravṛttiniṣṭhatvaṃ tathāsmin kena vāryate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6185: jñeyasya puruṣārthatvaṃ tatra cedatra tatsamam // MBs_4.9 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:6201: yadyapi ca saṃskārāttasyānuvṛttistathāpi śābdajñānamanusaṃtanvato viduṣo na pūrvavadbhavati nivartate cātyantāya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6202: dṛṣṭā ca jñānotpattereva puruṣārthatā kvacit kutūhalākulitānāmajñāte'rthe /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6209: pratyakṣādijñeyaṃ hi siddhaṃ vastu puruṣārthaḥ salilādiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:6212: atrāpi ca śabdaprameyaṃ svayameva brahma puruṣārtho jarādivividhāśivopaśamāt paramānandaprakāśatvācca suprasannam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6216: tattve tādātmyajñāne ca tathābhāvāt viśvāśivopaśamāt paramaśivabhāvācca paripūrṇaḥ puruṣārtho āpto bhavati /
